body_html: Okay the problem is that MSELoss with reduce=True is accumulating into float instead of double. This may be true with the other losses as well, I am going to take a look. I'll put a fix out soon.
body_text: Okay the problem is that MSELoss with reduce=True is accumulating into float instead of double. This may be true with the other losses as well, I am going to take a look. I'll put a fix out soon.
body: Okay the problem is that MSELoss with reduce=True is accumulating into float instead of double. This may be true with the other losses as well, I am going to take a look. I'll put a fix out soon.
